author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: حضرت رحمن انسان را بینا و شنوا خلق فرموده اگرچه بعضی او را عالم اصغر دانسته‌اند ولکن فی‌الحقیقه عالم اکبر است و مقام و رتبه و شأن هر انسانی باید در این یوم موعود ظاهر شود
translation: The All-Merciful hath conferred upon man the faculty of vision, and endowed him with the power of hearing. Some have described him as the “lesser world,” when, in reality, he should be regarded as the “greater world.” The potentialities inherent in the station of man, the full measure of his destiny on earth, the innate excellence of his reality, must all be manifested in this promised Day of God.
